title: Just Like Real Life
text:
Just Like Real Life is the third and final studio <a href="album">album</a> by the <a href="Christian%20rock">Christian rock</a> band <a href="Prodigal%20%28band%29">Prodigal</a>, released in <a href="1985%20in%20music">1985</a>.
The band created promotional music videos for "Future Now" and "Jump Cut," which were featured on <a href="Trinity%20Broadcasting%20Network">Trinity Broadcasting Network</a>'s music video show "Real Videos" at the time of the album's release.
